targets.rawSql:
/* Grafana Variable */
DECLARE @TargetBatch VARCHAR(20) = ${batch_no:singlequote}; 

DECLARE @Start DATETIME2, @Stop DATETIME2;
SELECT @Start = StartDateTime, @Stop = StopDateTime 
FROM sap 
WHERE batch_no = @TargetBatch;

-- ใช้ CTE รวบรวมข้อมูล โดยเลือกมา "เฉพาะที่ต้องใช้" จริงๆ ห้ามมีคอลัมน์อื่นปน
WITH CleanData AS (
    SELECT 
        -- Key สำหรับ Group: ตัดวินาทีทิ้ง (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm)
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), d.[timestamp], 120) AS [DateTimeKey],
        
        -- Column Header: ชื่อเซ็นเซอร์ (เติม Suffix แยก Temp/Humid)
        CASE 
            WHEN s.site_name IN ('th-windup', 'th-outside') THEN s.site_name + '_Temp'
            ELSE s.site_name 
        END AS [SensorColumn],
        
        -- Value: แปลงเป็น Float ให้ type ตรงกัน
        CAST(d.temp AS FLOAT) AS [Value]
    FROM em320_th_data d
    JOIN site_detail s ON d.site_id = s.id
    WHERE d.[timestamp] BETWEEN @Start AND @Stop
      AND s.site_name IN ('th-windup', 'th-outside')

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), d.[timestamp], 120),
        CASE 
            WHEN s.site_name IN ('th-windup', 'th-outside') THEN s.site_name + '_Humid'
            ELSE s.site_name 
        END,
        CAST(d.humid AS FLOAT)
    FROM em320_th_data d
    JOIN site_detail s ON d.site_id = s.id
    WHERE d.[timestamp] BETWEEN @Start AND @Stop
      AND s.site_name IN ('th-windup', 'th-outside')

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), d.[timestamp], 120),
        s.site_name, -- กลุ่ม Ozone ไม่ต้องแก้ชื่อ
        CAST(d.oz AS FLOAT)
    FROM o3_data d
    JOIN site_detail s ON d.site_id = s.id
    WHERE d.[timestamp] BETWEEN @Start AND @Stop
      AND s.site_name IN ('o3-windup', 'o3-outside')

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), d.[timestamp], 120),
        s.site_name, -- กลุ่ม Tank ไม่ต้องแก้ชื่อ
        CAST(d.temp AS FLOAT)
    FROM em500_pt100_data d
    JOIN site_detail s ON d.site_id = s.id
    WHERE d.[timestamp] BETWEEN @Start AND @Stop
      AND s.site_name IN ('t-sat tank-01', 't-sat tank-02')
)

-- ส่วน PIVOT
SELECT 
    LEFT(DateTimeKey, 10) AS [Date], 
    RIGHT(DateTimeKey, 5) AS [Time],
    [o3-windup], 
    [o3-outside], 
    [t-sat tank-01], 
    [t-sat tank-02],
    [th-windup_Temp],
    [th-outside_Temp],
    [th-windup_Humid],
    [th-outside_Humid]
FROM CleanData -- ดึงจาก CTE ที่มีแค่ 3 คอลัมน์ (Time, Name, Value)
PIVOT (
    AVG(Value) -- ใช้ AVG ยุบรวมข้อมูล
    FOR SensorColumn IN (
        [o3-windup], 
        [o3-outside], 
        [t-sat tank-01], 
        [t-sat tank-02],
        [th-windup_Temp],
        [th-outside_Temp],
        [th-windup_Humid],
        [th-outside_Humid]
    )
) AS pvt
ORDER BY [Date] DESC, [Time] DESC;

list.definition:
select Distinct batch_no
from sap
order by batch_no desc
list.name: batch_no
list.query:
select Distinct batch_no
from sap
order by batch_no desc
